definition.text: To finish this basic setup, I have gone ahead and installed the BTC/USDT market for you.

paragraphs.text: The Install a New Market Tutorial taught you that installing a market sets up everything you need for a basic Superalgos workspace. This includes automatically setting up a Backtesting Session, Live Trading Session, and charts for each Trading System present in the workspace.

You could run this basic setup as it stands. In fact, if you are looking for a basic way to set things up, installing a plugin Data Mine, Trading System, and finishing by installing a Market will get you up and running in no time. But that’s not the point of this Tutorial! Let’s dig into some custom charts!
